text: Midland Valley High School (MVHS) is a four-year high school located in Graniteville, South Carolina, United States. It is part of the Aiken County Public School District and is home of the Mustangs. ==History== Midland Valley was founded in 1980 as the merger of two other schools, Langley Bath Clearwater and Leavelle McCampbell. Those schools became middle schools. MVHS celebrated its first graduating class in 1981. ==References== ==External links== *School website *School District website Category:Public high schools in South Carolina Category:Schools in Aiken County, South Carolina
title: Midland Valley High School
